ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I made it to the Rivervale zone just fine, then immediately got feared by two risen commanders someone had dumped at the zone.  Due to pathing bugs, I
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 7 Nov 1999, Dark wrote:
>
> The place can turn into a problem for somebody of all levels. My 45th necro
> the other day was running through with jboots and lost 500+ just from
> spells. the bottom line is you have to be careful when going through that
> zone it's not impossible just tough.

I made it to the Rivervale zone just fine, then immediately
got feared by two risen commanders someone had dumped at the
zone. Due to pathing bugs, I ended up running straight into a
wall, and both of them killed my L40 bard in about 15 seconds
(I dropped about 1 second after the fear effect ended).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
